title: Luxury Subscription Box Platform
description: A premium, visually stunning subscription box platform designed for luxury e-commerce.

generation_hints.image_optimization: Use next/image for all subscription box images with shimmer placeholder
generation_hints.shimmer_effect: Implement shimmer animation on product cards for premium feel
generation_hints.sidebar_navigation: Make sidebar collapsible on mobile with smooth slide animations
generation_hints.filter_system: Implement radio button filters for category selection
generation_hints.loading_state: Show skeleton loaders in grid layout while products load
generation_hints.member_display: Show member count in footer with icon for social proof
